pages.text: A shell of its former self.

You might find these living exoskeletons of former spiders, it was theorized that they are an extinct species of spiders that originated from the Overworld before being influenced by Necromancy.$(br2)Their life source originates from the essence hovering on top of them, they would make a decent source of pure essence for this reason.

You could $(4)right-click$() on them with some biomass to pacify and infect them with a thriving colony.$(br2)Every once in awhile these infected exoskeletons will shed some excess biomass from themselves.
